snippet.title: Watched Teaser
snippet.description:
Watch out. LithoBreak is an episodic mining simulation game following Eli, a deep-space moon mining mastermind working on the next big thing.  Chemistry must be leveraged to process resources, Orbital Mechanics will define resource movement, and Materials Science determines the lifespan of every part produced.

LithoBreak combines fun gameplay, advanced science concepts, and a deep Sci-Fi verse.

Tau Ceti Labs - Play With Science


Game Page:
https://taucetilabs.com/lithobreak

Steam Store Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1091030/LithoBreak/
